TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VisualBasic extends System.Object
public ref class VisualBasic abstract sealed

Docs.summary: Provides an attached property store for .

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasic> allows for an instance of <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicSettings> to be attached to the top level activity in a workflow defined in a XAML file, thus defining the settings for all <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicReference%601> and <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicValue%601> expressions in that workflow.

Docs.param: The object to which the instance is attached.
Docs.summary: Attaches a instance to an object for use by its implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasic.SetSettingsForImplementation%2A> exists for the activity author who is creating a new activity in a class. Any <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicSettings> required by the new activity's implementation should be attached to the activity in the constructor using <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasic.SetSettingsForImplementation%2A>.
